original_title: Rob Rock: The Voice of Melodic Metal
overview: The renowned Impellitteri frontman Rob Rock (Axel Rudi Pell, Driver, Avantasia, Warrior) takes to the stage at Progpower USA IX in Atlanta on September 27th 2008, along with Andreas Passmark a.k.a. Andreas Olssen (Royal Hunt, Work of Art, W.E.T., Tony Mills, Narnia etc) on bass and vocals, Tracy Shell (Gemini) on drums, C. J. Grimmark (Narnia, Beautiful Sin, Grimmark) and Petter Hallgren (Nordic Union, Sorcerer) on guitars.  The DVD release also included live bonus footage from the European Festival 200, and Japan Promotion 1996.  01 - Garden Of Chaos 00:46  02 - First Winds Of The End Of Time 04:57  03 - Rock The Earth 09:36  04 - In The Night 14:50  05 - Slayer Of Souls 20:55  06 - Judgement Day 24:40  07 - Only A Matter Of Time 27:10  08 - This Time Is The Last Time 30:30  09 - Savior's Call 38:06  10 - Metal Breed 42:46  11 - I'm A Warrior 50:44
title: Rob Rock: The Voice of Melodic Metal
